description:
Easy typing of special characters on Windows


- fix startup issue with missing System.
  ValueTuple.dll (#425)
- do not write debug messages to the log file (#420)
- address an issue where WinCompose may interfer with monitor sleep (#432)
- (maybe) fix an issue with the tooltip appearing at random times (#426, #350)
- fix erratic behaviour of <kbd>Scroll Lock</kbd> key (#321, #421, #393)
